player

Class InformationHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.InformationHandle

  • public class InformationHandle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows intelligent actors to ask questions to the system.

    Part of the AI API: custom AI's can use an object of this class (when provided) to inspect certain aspects of the system.
    Author:
    Daan

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getPreviousTrick

        public Card[] getPreviousTrick()
        Returns the previous trick as an array. If the current trick is the first one, null will be returned.
        Returns:
        an array of Cards of size 4, or null.

      • inspectField

        public java.util.List<Card> inspectField()
        Returns a (sorted) list of the cards on the field. The list will be empty if no cards were played yet.
        Returns:
        a List of Cards

      • isValidCard

        public boolean isValidCard(Card card)
        Checks if the given card is valid to play at this time. Returns false if the card is null.
        Parameters:
        card -
        Returns:
        true if it is

      • inspectTrump

        public Suit inspectTrump()
        Inspects the current trump. When the round is no-trump, null is returned.
        Returns:
        a Suit

      • getMultiplier

        public int getMultiplier()
        Returns the multiplier for the current round. This is the factor by which the score over 30 is multiplied at the end of the round.

      • getTurn

        public int getTurn()
        Returns the players position in the current trick's order of play. This is a number ranging from 0 (first player to play a card) to 3 (last person to play a card).
        Returns:
        position (int)

      • getDealerTurn

        public int getDealerTurn()
        Returns the dealers position in the current trick's order of play. This is a number ranging from 0 (dealer was first to play a card) to 3 (dealer is last to play a card)
        Returns:
        position (int)

      • getCurrentAllyPoolScore

        public int getCurrentAllyPoolScore()
        Returns the current pool score for the allied team. This is the sum of the values of the cards in the tricks the allied team has won.
        Returns:
        integer

      • getCurrentEnemyPoolScore

        public int getCurrentEnemyPoolScore()
        Return the current pool score for the enemy team. This is the sum of the values of the cards in the tricks the enemy team has won.
        Returns:
        integer
